price: (16) Do you feel secure that He who is above[1718] would not cause the earth to swallow you and suddenly it would sway?[1719]
arabic: ءَأَمِنتُم مَّن فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ أَن يَخۡسِفَ بِكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَمُورُ
footnotes:
[1718]- Literally, "in ascendancy" or "over the heaven."
[1719]- In a circular motion, as in an earthquake.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: a-amintum man fī al-samāi an yakhsifa bikumu al-arḍa fa-idhā hiya tamūru
